name: Spray
description: “Spray” was a Processing animation. I had fun doing this. Jitter, colors, people. Bonus is that I can take video's from the animation in a way that these videos are like a ‘still’ taken from the animation. Hundreds of video versions of the same animation can be produced.  2011 CR 664 https://hansup.be/2011_spray_animation_hans-verhaegen.html
